original: Larsson, Kurt William Johannes, teol. o. fil. kand., kyrkoherde, Kin-narp, f. 15/9/05 i Lemnhult, Jönköp. I., av J. L. Larsson o. h. h. f. Grip. , G. 34 m. Ruth Boström. Barn: Kerstin f. 35, Håkan 40. — Stud :ex. i Borås 26, fil. kand. i Lund 28, teol. kand. 31, prästv. i Skara 32. V. pastor i Gudhem 32, kommin. i Undenäs 33-39, kyrkoh. i Kinneved fr. 39. Ordf. i Undenäs folksk iistyr. o. barnav:nd 36-37, i Kinneveds o. Vårkumla kyrkoråd o. kyrkostämma.
translated:
Larsson, Kurt William Johannes, B.A. in theology and philosophy, parish priest in Kin-narp, born on September 15, 1905 in Lemnhult, Jönköping County. Son of J. L. Larsson and his wife H. H. [surname] Grip. Married in 1934 to Ruth Boström. Children: Kerstin, born in 1935, Håkan in 1940. Completed studies: graduated high school in Borås in 1926, obtained a B.A. in philosophy in Lund in 1928, achieved a B.A. in theology in 1931, ordained as a priest in Skara in 1932. Served as an assistant pastor in Gudhem from 1932, curate in Undenäs from 1933-1939, and parish priest in Kinneved from 1939. Chairman of the board of Undenäs public school committee and child welfare committee from 1936-1937, and of Kinneveds and Vårkumla church council and church assembly.

Note: The abbreviation "G." before the year indicates that the person got married in that year.
